# Code of Conduct

## Prima Team Standards

All team members contributing to Prima Delivery are expected to:

- Maintain professional and respectful communication
- Provide constructive feedback on code reviews
- Document changes thoroughly
- Follow established coding standards and patterns
- Keep proprietary information confidential

## Reporting Issues

For concerns about conduct or collaboration issues, contact your team lead or HR.

## Scope

This applies to all interactions within this repository and related communication channels.
